name: Velazquez (Boston) Joaquin
goal:
Entreps is the International Board of Business Owners and Entrepreneurs. Entreps is a Brussels-based AISBL and a non-profitable, non-political, non-religious international organization based present in 124 countries (what means 124 counsels carrying our activities free) who promotes and backs up the shared interests of: SMEs, Entrepreneurs, Innovative and Techy Actors, International Traders, StartUps, Autonomous Workers, Investors and Institutions who either run or enhance sustainable business activities.
Entreps was born in Boston MA, US in 2010 and gathers together 2,2 million organizations and people in the 5 continents; its activities are mainly related to business developing and to institutional affairs.
So far Entreps, the organization, has worked hand in hand with the UN, the European Commission (DG Grow, DG Employment and others DGs), the EESC of the EU, the Committee of the Regions of the EU, the US Government, some Latinamerica's and Asia's and Africa's powers and many other business doers such as EuroChambres, Best Franchisee of the World, LinkedIn, INDITEX ZARA, InterNations... and personalities such as Bill Clinton, Vicente Fox, Henri Malosse, Markku Markkula, Arnaldo Abruzzini, Amancio Ortega, Madi Sharma, and others.
Among our projects you can count on the "European Entreps DNA", the "ByLeaders, World GeoCommunity", the "Entreps Non-Borders Business Passport" for Business Doers, the "1st Year of No-Taxation" for Entrepreneurs and StartUps and SMEs, and the "Global Entreps Awards" who gathers together every year around 5,000 representatives and business doers from all over the world. Please take a look at this examples:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1QTWqBs4700

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=N7Dlcjm9zdk

Entreps has presented awards to organizations and people and companies in its anual galas, and supports organizations like GYLF (Global Youth Leadership Forum), Young Entrepreneurs of the EU, African SMEs, International Franchisers...
These are some videos with the winners:

DG Grow Antti Peltomaki and Winner Arnaldo Abruzzini, CEO of EuroChambres: https://youtu.be/XWTDasYOfGg

Winner Markku Markkula, President of the Committee of the Regions of Europe: https://youtu.be/A7M6niCLkqI

Winner Madi Sharma, Serial Entrepreneur who overcame many "stones in her life" and author of the book "No Excuses": https://youtu.be/-RY_9mxvDWk

Winner Henri Malosse, President of the European Social and Economic Committee: https://youtu.be/rMUs8LtABy4

Winner Barry Matherly, President of the US 5,000-Regional-Development-Agencies: https://youtu.be/yb8TuILMA-Q

Entreps plays an active role in the EUWRC, European Week of Regions and Cities:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f90dpUHzJ-E

And coorganizes many events and meetings with the collaboration of www.InterNations.org holding a Consul Position in this organization in order to promote business nertworking among more than 120 nationalities.

Entreps believes and promotes Nature and Honesty above other principles and as our gesture stands, with our hand over our forehead, we are always: "Looking Forward for a Better Future".

Contact us via:

Protocol@entreps.org

Thank you.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Humanitarian Aid, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Sport, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
